advices_lang_16.html:
Hint
Readclose
Stuck? Time to become a PrestaShop Ninja! Learn how to use your Back-Office and start managing your online shop 50% faster!
  PrestaShop User Online Training

Are you a new online merchant and want to learn how to use your new Back-Office, discover new features and start selling quickly? Don’t lose any time. Join our comprehensive online training hosted by PrestaShop training experts, right from the comfort of your home!

Close More information

Advice
Lireclose
Marketplaces have experienced 60% growth in 2013. Take advantage of this channel to increase your sales!
  eBay
By selling on eBay, one of the world’s largest marketplaces, you’ll have access to millions of new customers.
  • You’ll be able to develop a new profitable sales channel
  • You’ll have the opportunity to sell quickly and easily in Europe and worldwide
  • You can create listings and sell across both channels from one place
  • You can install the eBay module for no additional charge
Close Discover the module

Advice
Joinclose
Help us translate PrestaShop 1.6 into your language by joining us on Crowdin!
Discover the Power of 3500+ Modules and Themes to enhance your PrestaShop Store!

Go mobile and boost your sales

Marketplaces have experienced 60% growth in 2013. Take advantage of this channel to increase your sales!

By selling on eBay, one of the world’s largest marketplaces, you’ll have access to millions of new customers.
- You’ll be able to develop a new profitable sales channel

Tips of the day

Boost your sales abroad !

30 to 70% of buyers accross Europe prefer to pay with local payment methods. With more than 150 payment methods, we support your expansion in your home markets and beyond.Activate the payment methods that matter with one single contract!

Did you know that gaining customer loyalty costs 5 x less than winning a new customer?

Advice Sendinblue

SendinBlue is a unique Emailing & SMS solution which enables you to:

- Synchronize automatically your contacts (registered and unregistered) between your website and your SendinBlue account

- Create engaging emails without any HTML knowledge

- Choose your recipients with accuracy, thanks to our powerful segmenting tool

- Manage your emails efficiently (order confirmation, shipping products …)

- Boost your Open Rate

- Follow your results in real time

Advice
ReadClose
Offering personalized recommendations to your customers can increase your conversion rate by 65%
Advice Nosto - Personalization for Prestashop

Did you know that personalization is one of the most efficient ways to increase online sales through conversion? By personalizing your online store every customer is individually targeted with items they are most likely to purchase at each step of their customer journey, enabling you to increase average order value by 25% and conversion by 65%!

With Nosto you are able to:

  • Increase average order value with cross- and up-sell recommendations
  • Boost conversion rate with relevant product recommendations
  • Increase retention with personalized recommendations
  • Learn more about your customers through a real-time dashboard view
  • Reduce bounce rate with top lists
  • Be up and running with a risk-free 2 min setup, a ""no sales/no bill"" pricing model and no minimum contract length
Close Try Nosto for free!

Tips of the day

By 2016, 64% of European buyers will be from outside the UK and Germany

Increase your business by selling on marketplaces and reach new targets: you can now tailor listings to individual countries! Benefit from a 90 days free store trial when opening a new eBay store.

Start now
Tips of the day

3 tips to target a specific country on a marketplace

1.Create attractive item title and description, optimized for local search
2.Check local listings to set the price
3.Make sure your return policy complies with local requirements!.

Start now
